April 22, 1963
Mr. Capus Waynick
Executive Vice President
The Richardson Foundation, Inc.
122 East told Street
Hew York 17, Hew York
Dear Mr. Waynick:
Several months ago, in response to your invi¬
tation, we sent you a proposal on a "Plan for
Professional Development of Educational Broadcasting
as an Aid to Better Citizenship.n
It may very well he that upon examination, the
proposal did not accord with your present interests,
but since we have had no acknowledgment of its
receipt, it occurred to me that it might just possi¬
bly have gone astray.
Sincerely yours.
William G. Harley
WGH'.jms
